main body: It was a dark and stormy night. In her attic bedroom Margaret Murry, wrapped in an old patchwork quilt, sat on the foot of her bed and watched the trees tossing in the frenzied lashing of the wind.

short description: Boardgames are better than you remember
main body: Modern boardgames are far from Monopoly or Chutes and Ladders that you might remember from your childhood. Have you heard of Pandemic, Azul, Clank! or Codenames?
